Derived variable functions

Functions for deriving custom CCHS variables

active_transport1_fun()

Daily active transportation (2001-2005)

active_transport2_fun()

Daily active transportation (2007-2014)

active_transport3_fun()

Daily active transportation (2015-2018)

calculate_bmi() bmi_fun()

Calculate Body Mass Index (BMI) with comprehensive validation

adjust_bmi() adjusted_bmi_fun()

Calculate bias-corrected BMI for self-reported data

categorize_bmi() bmi_fun_cat()

Categorize BMI values using WHO standard categories

pack_years_fun()

Smoking pack-years (unified approach)

pct_time_fun()

Percent time in Canada

resp_condition_fun1()

resp_condition_fun1

resp_condition_fun2()

resp_condition_fun2

resp_condition_fun3()

resp_condition_fun3

age_cat_fun()

Derived categorical age

assess_binge_drinking() binge_drinker_fun()

Identify binge drinking patterns with sex-specific thresholds

multiple_conditions_fun1()

Number of chronic conditions (5 chronic conditions)

multiple_conditions_fun2()

Number of chronic conditions (6 chronic conditions)

assess_adl() adl_fun()

Enhanced Activities of Daily Living (ADL) help indicator

RACDPAL_fun()

Participation and Activity Limitation

score_adl() adl_score_5_fun()

Enhanced ADL help score (count of tasks requiring help)

score_adl_6() adl_score_6_fun()

Enhanced 6-item ADL help score with comprehensive validation

COPD_Emph_der_fun1

COPD_Emph_der_fun2()

COPD_Emph_der_fun2

Diet score

diet_score_fun_cat()

Categorized diet score

smoke_simple_fun()

Simple smoking status (unified approach)

time_quit_smoking_fun()

Time since quit smoking (unified approach)

assess_drinking_risk_short() low_drink_short_fun()

Assess short-term alcohol health risks using Low-Risk Guidelines

assess_drinking_risk_long() low_drink_long_fun()

Assess long-term alcohol health risks using Low-Risk Guidelines

low_drink_score_fun()

Low drinking score (all cycles)

low_drink_score_fun1()

Low drinking score (select cycles)

immigration_fun()

Immigration by ethnicity and settlement

pct_time_fun_cat()

Categorical percent time in Canada

energy_exp_fun() calculate_energy_expenditure()

Daily energy expenditure in leisure activity

Type of smokers (unified approach)

Age started smoking daily - daily/former daily smokers (unified approach)

Five-item social provision scale (SPS-5)

Deprecated function aliases

Backward compatibility aliases for modernized functions (deprecated in v3.0.0)

adjusted_bmi_fun()

Adjusted Body Mass Index (BMI) derived variable

bmi_fun_cat()

Categorical BMI (international standard)

Activities of Daily Living (ADL) help indicator

ADL help score (count of tasks requiring help)

adl_score_6_fun()

The number of activities of daily living tasks that require help.

Internal and derived helper functions

Internal functions and derived variable helpers

ALCDTYP_A()

ICES Type of drinker

SMK09AB_fun()

Years since stopped smoking for former daily smokers (categorical - version 2)

SMK09AI_fun()

Years since stopped smoking for former daily smokers (categorical - version 1)

SMK09C_fun()

Years since stopped smoking for former daily smokers (categorical - version 3)

SMKG040_fun_A()

Age started smoking daily - daily/former daily smokers (enhanced validation wrapper)

SMKG203I_fun()

Age started to smoke daily - daily smoker (modern CCHS 2015+)

SMKG207I_fun()

Age started to smoke daily - former daily smoker (modern CCHS 2015+)

SPU25_fun()

Time since stopped smoking for former daily smokers (cycle 2022)

adjusted_bmi_fun_D()

Adjusted BMI derived variable (Master/Shared versions)

adl_fun_B()

This newly derived variable (ADL_der_B) uses ADL_01 to ADL_06 which are consistent across survey cycles from 2003-2014. ADL_der_B is recommended when using multiple survey cycles.

bmi_fun_D()

Body Mass Index (BMI) derived variable (Master/Shared versions)

bmi_fun_cat_D()

Categorical BMI (Master/Shared versions)

pack_years_fun_A()

Smoking pack-years (enhanced validation wrapper)

smoke_simple_fun_A()

Simple smoking status (enhanced validation wrapper)

time_quit_smoking_fun_A()

Time since quit smoking (enhanced validation wrapper)

has_cchs_missing_codes()

Check if variable uses CCHS missing code pattern

preprocess_categorical_age()

Preprocess categorical age CCHS variables

preprocess_cchs_missing_codes()

CCHS Missing Data Preprocessing Helpers

preprocess_continuous_standard()

Preprocess continuous CCHS variables with extended missing codes

preprocess_smoking_variable()

Preprocess smoking-specific CCHS variables

preprocess_standard_response()

Preprocess standard response CCHS variables

standardise_csv()

Fix CSV files for git collaboration (Getting Started Approach)

validate_missing_code_preprocessing()

Validate CCHS missing code preprocessing results

Potentially problematic variables

Derived variables in cchsflow that users may run into issues with

ALW_1()

Any alcohol past week

ALW_2A1()

Number of drinks - Sunday

ALW_2A2()

Number of drinks - Monday

ALW_2A3()

Number of drinks - Tuesday

ALW_2A4()

Number of drinks - Wednesday

ALW_2A5()

Number of drinks - Thursday

ALW_2A6()

Number of drinks - Friday

ALW_2A7()

Number of drinks - Saturday

ALWDWKY()

Number of drinks consumed in the past week

ALWDDLY()

Average daily alcohol consumption

ALCDTYP()

Type of drinker

ALCDTTM()

Type of drinker (12 months)

Derived Depression Scale - Short Form Score

DPSDPP()

Depression Scale - Predicted Probability

food_insecurity_der()

Food insecurity

GEN_02A2()

Satisfaction with life (GEN_02A/GEN_02A2)

LBFA_31A()

Occupation Group (9 categories)

LBFA_31A_a()

Occupation Group (5 categories)

LBFA_31A_b()

Occupation Group (6 categories)

CCHS datasets

Datasets for each CCHS cycle

cchs2001_p

2001 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2003_p

2003 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2005_p

2005 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2007_2008_p

2007-2008 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2009_2010_p

2009-2010 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2010_p

2010 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2011_2012_p

2011-2012 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2012_p

2012 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2013_2014_p

2013-2014 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2014_p

2014 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2015_2016_p

2015-2016 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2017_2018_p

2017-2018 CCHS PUMF subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2009_s

2009 CCHS synthetic subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2010_s

2010 CCHS synthetic subset data (200 respondents)

cchs2012_s

2012 CCHS synthetic subset data (200 respondents)
